episodes.title: SUMMER '69: Inside the Hippy Cult of Chaos - The Manson CULT AND MURDERS | FULL CRIME DOCUMENTARY
episodes.description:
Charles Manson and his infamous 'hippy killers' shattered the illusion of peace and love in 1960s California. Leading the Manson Family cult, Manson manipulated his followers—who seemed to embody the free-spirited, anti-establishment ideals of the hippy era—into committing brutal, senseless murders. In the summer of 1969, this so-called family turned on Hollywood’s elite, culminating in the tragic killing of actress Sharon Tate, who was 8 months pregnant, and others in a spree that would haunt the nation. Discover how a twisted vision turned a hippy dream into a nightmare that forever scarred American history.

Stars: Glen Lloyd
Director: Remone Jones
Writer: Remone Jones

Welcome to The World of Crime®, the ultimate YouTube channel for true crime enthusiasts! Simpson, Jack the Ripper, Jeffrey Dahmer, Charles Manson, and many more. Our channel also offers a wide selection of true crime films to keep you on the edge of your seat.
